item.description:
Need an excuse to study Arabic? Meet us Sunday Morning at Bourbon Coffee shop in Porter Square Cambridge. Bring study materials, chat in Arabic or ask some grammar questions that have you stumped.

Optional Assignment - If you want something to study: watch & work on understanding this BBC Arabic video: Mines along the Syrian border with Lebanon near Homs

http://www.bbc.co.uk/...

Hint: If you want some context copy/past the article summary into google translate.

We'll probably stay a couple hours then get lunch at a nearby restaurant if people are interested.
item.name: Sunday Morning Arabic Study Meetup
